tag_line: Makes vehicles practically indestructible, with a few cavaeats.
title: "Indestructible" Vehicles
message:
[CENTER][B]Indestructible Vehicles[/B]
This is an add-on part for the vanilla game vehicles.[/CENTER]

[B]How To Use[/B]
- Spawn your [I]default game vehicle [/I]of choice
- Go to the parts menu (Default key activation is CTRL+W)
- Select "Indestructible" under "Additional Modification"
- Click apply if you automatic part changes is turned off

[B]Notes[/B]
- This will [B]not[/B] prevent part inversion. It's still possible to crash with enough force that parts will go inside out (ex. part of a bumper may be inside out after a hard crash)

- This does not make things [I]impossible[/I] to break. It's still possible to break sensitive parts. Some vehicles may especially be prone to this.

- This does not change vehicle rigidity. If you go into slow motion, the vehicle will be incredibly wobbly as more force is now distributed throughout the entire vehicle

- This does not prevent instabilities. In fact, it makes them happen even more for a similar reason as the above point.

- Vehicles will become incredibly bouncy for a similar reason as the above points

- This does not change node/beam counts. There is no performance gain using this, despite the "degraded experience"
[B][/B]
via: packed by repo on Fri, 23 Oct 2020 02:00:21 GMT
